alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 12:41PM PST until February 24 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 11 inches. Lower Valley locations can expect lower amounts of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
